name: mcp-coincap-jj
description: A cryptocurrency price and market analysis tool using CoinCap API v3
author: wazzan

tools.name: get-crypto-price
tools.description: Get current price and 24h stats for a cryptocurrency

tools.name: get-market-analysis
tools.description: Get detailed market analysis including top exchanges and volume distribution

tools.name: get-historical-analysis
tools.description: Get historical price analysis with customizable timeframe

apiKey.name: CoinCap API Key
apiKey.description: Required for access to CoinCap API v3
